profile: Ontario Concrete Finishing specializes in decorative stamped concrete. With over 25 years experience, OCF is the guaranteed choice for your stamped concrete needs. Quality work from patios to driveways, steps with LED lights, pool decks, and landscape design, we make your outdoor living space a dream come true. Established in May 1990 by Frank Barone, Ontario Concrete Finishing has remained an industry leader based on a reputation of quality workmanship, attention to detail, experience, and integrity. Our extensive body of work displays the variety of decorative and practical applications of concrete. We utilize only the most advanced forming and finishing technologies in creating our final product; we believe your satisfaction deserves nothing less. Servicing the Durham Region for over 25 years • Ontario Concrete Finishing serves Oshawa, Whitby, Ajax, Clarington and Pickering • Professional On-site consultation, all work is covered by a 2 year warranty • 30 designs to choose from, unlimited colors We offer a wide range of landscape construction services to enhance your outdoor living space: • Decorative Stamped Concrete • Steps, Patios and Porches • Driveways • Curbs and Sidewalks • Complete Landscape Design & Construction • Natural Stone Placement • Retaining walls • Custom Water Falls • Precast Water Fountains • Irrigation Systems • Custom Gazebos • Pergolas • Pool Houses and Pool Decks • Concrete sealing/maintenance Thank you for visiting, we look forward to working for you this season!
hours: Monday through Friday 7 AM to 5 PM Saturday by App.
